LOHERA Name: The Woodman PH (No 128)- Address: Bourne Hill- Type: Public house- Local Heritage Asset: Built around 1727, originally as two rustic small cottages now conjoined and enlarged.  Whilst living at The Woodman in 1868, retired policeman, Henry Wale, asked the local magistrates if he could have permission to sell ale from his front sitting room.

description: Details submitted to 25/01243/FUL for Construction Management Plan (4), landscaping (6), biodiversity (7) and external lighting (8) in respect of the single storey rear to side extension and creation of a plant room with rear terrace and associated works to hardstanding.
